### Read Some Text

```{r echo=FALSE}

document <- as.character(fa("file", fill = "#e86af0", height = "25px"))

book <- as.character(fa("book", fill = "#f06ab5", height = "25px"))

site <- as.character(fa("link", fill = "	#a56af0", height = "25px"))

linkfa <- as.character(fa("link", fill = "#a56af0", height = "25px"))

review <- tibble(
  
  title <- c("<i>Aural Versus Visual Design of Questions and Questionnaires</i>",
             "<i>Ordering Questions and Testing for Question Order Effects</i>",
             "<i>Test Development</i>",
             "<i>Validity</i>"
             ),
  
  section = c("Chapter 6",
              "Chapter 7",
              "Chapter 4",
              "Chapter 9"),
  
  link <- c(
    paste0("[",book,"]",
    "(https://ebookcentral.proquest.com/lib/wvu/reader.action?docID=1762797&ppg=189){target='_blank'}"
    ),
    paste0("[",book,"]",
    "(https://ebookcentral.proquest.com/lib/wvu/reader.action?docID=1762797&ppg=248){target='_blank'}"
    ),
    paste0("[",linkfa,"]",
    "(https://www.thetaminusb.com/intro-measurement-r/development.html){target='_blank'}"
    ),
    paste0("[",linkfa,"]",
    "(https://www.thetaminusb.com/intro-measurement-r/validity.html){target='_blank'}"
    )
  ),
  
  .name_repair = "minimal"
  
)

```

<center>
```{r, echo=FALSE}
review %>%
  mutate_all(replace_na,"") %>%
  kbl(col.names = c("Title", 
                    "Section",
                    "Link"), 
      "html", 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'llc') %>%
   kable_paper(full_width = TRUE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "20em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "10em") %>% 
  row_spec(0:nrow(review), extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;', color = "#f7f7f7", background = "transparent") 
```
</center>
